title: George W. Bush: Better Health Care in Africa Must Go Beyond HIV
text: 11/15/10 20:26:31 09 Oct 2015 13:05 George W. Bush: Better Health Care in Africa Must Go Beyond HIV Time More Daily Show ‘s Trevor Noah: Donald Trump Is a Perfect African President You Can Now Watch Africa’s Great Migration of Wildebeest Live Online What the U.N.’s New Development Goals Mean for Africa ‘Joe, run’ should scare Republicans The Post reported : The Draft Biden super PAC has launched an ad campaign trying to encourage Vice President Biden to enter the 2016 Democratic presidential nomination contest, using his personal story How can an introvert like Jeb Bush be a politician? Washington Post Quick, what comes to mind when you think of the stereotypical American politician? Okay, but what else beyond what probably just came to mind? How do politicians interact with people, for example? Why Ryan doesn’t want to be speaker; Republicans split on debt limit and Clinton Washington Post PAUL RYAN STICKING TO WAYS AND MEANS. Washington Post A hospital bombed in the midst of intense fighting. Patients and staff killed and wounded, the facility destroyed. An unspeakable tragedy — and unfortunately one seen before in recent and current conflicts. Was it a war crime?
